title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development, covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

lessons.title: Understanding HTML Structure
lessons.description: Learn about HTML tags and document structure

content.data: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.
HTML forms are used to collect user input. Learn how to create effective and accessible forms.

lessons.title: CSS Selectors and Properties
lessons.description: Master CSS selectors and common properties

content.data: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages.

title: JavaScript Programming
description: Dive into JavaScript programming and learn to create interactive web applications.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Understand JavaScript variables and basic data types

content.data: JavaScript is a programming language that enables interactive web pages.

title: React Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

lessons.title: Components and Props
lessons.description: Understand React components and how to use props

content.data: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications.

title: Python for Beginners
description: Start your programming journey with Python, a versatile and beginner-friendly language.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Structures
lessons.description: Learn about Python variables and basic data structures

content.data: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability.

title: Data Science Essentials
description: Explore the fundamentals of data science, including statistics and machine learning.

lessons.title: Descriptive Statistics
lessons.description: Learn about measures of central tendency and dispersion

content.data: Statistics is the science of collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data.
